review.title: “Worked as a computer operator and web designer. I had fun”
review.pros: Pros – There was prompt payment of salary while i worked at Ideal Insurance Brokers. The company was constantly opened to great business ideas and opportunities
review.cons: Cons – The Salary was very low and wasn't improving even over the years and after several openings. I think it had a lot to do with the management policies of the company which had a lot to do with the ideals of the business owners
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – My advice to the Management is that they should bump up the salary structure

review.title: “Not an Ideal company to work with”
review.pros: Pros – Good Exposure as the company is small.Various Opportunities as Insurance industry is growing in India
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Has been a great place for learning insurance at large.for immense exposure, this is a right place to start with.”

review.cons: Cons – Sometimes it become tough to manage all things all together.
